attributes.action: Compulsory Youth Service in Every County Provided By Councils
attributes.additional_details:
Make it compulsory for every Council across the UK to provide a Council funded Youth Service or Provision.
Young people are the future and Youth Provisions and services can bring Youth out of their shells and provides a confidential and professional service where Youth can speak to trained Youth Workers about issues such as; Mental Well being, Bullying and Sexual Health.
